requirements.DESCRIPTION: The input voltage shall be sensed by the MCU with a dedicated ADC line.
requirements.VALIDATION_CRITERIA: Measure ADC input voltage reading vs applied voltage.

requirements.DESCRIPTION: In line mode, the SDU shall function on its normal operation until the input voltage drops below 21.6V, where it enters input undervoltage.
requirements.VALIDATION_CRITERIA: At 21.7V remain normal; at 21.6V (or below) detect transition to input undervoltage state.

requirements.DESCRIPTION: On input undervoltage the SDU shall go to Battery Mode if there is a battery backup else output shall be turned off.
requirements.VALIDATION_CRITERIA: Remove DC below threshold with battery connected -> enters Battery Mode; without battery -> output off.

requirements.DESCRIPTION: In line mode, the SDU shall function normally until the input voltage goes beyond 28.6V, where it enters input overvoltage.
requirements.VALIDATION_CRITERIA: At 28.6V normal; at >28.6V detect overvoltage state.

requirements.DESCRIPTION: On input overvoltage the SDU shall go to Battery Mode if there is a battery backup else output shall be turned off.
requirements.VALIDATION_CRITERIA: Drive >28.6V with battery -> Battery Mode; without battery -> output off.

requirements.DESCRIPTION: The SDU shall automatically resume normal operation in line mode after the input voltage recovers.
requirements.VALIDATION_CRITERIA: After undervoltage/overvoltage, restore voltage to acceptable band -> normal mode resumes.
